name: MIS DARU Incident Tracker
description:
The report is used by the Data Analysis and Reporting Unit (DARU) to monitor, assure and report against the volume and quality of Incidents data.
INC0022 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 24/05/18

dataset.name: Incidents
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID)) AS NUMBER_OF_INCIDENTS, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-04-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE <= TO_DATE('01-05-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) GROUP BY AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID), dataset_ AS (SELECT INCIDENT_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, NUMBER_OF_INCIDENTS, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_CASE_ID FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
